--------------------
Text: Marij Kogoj:  He was a pupil of Schoenberg and Franz Schreker, and immensely popular during the 1920s, culminating with his opera "Črne maske" (Black masks).
Triplets:<Marij Kogoj
2:
Text: Marij Kogoj:  His career ended in 1932, when he was institutionalized for schizophrenia.
Triplets: <Marij Kogoj
3:
--------------------
Text: Marij Kogoj:  He remained there until his death in 1956.

Triplets:<Marij Kogoj
